name: Olivia Garland
description: Prior to theUnification War, Olivia and her brother were police officers at theFifth Precinct, alongside their companionFrank. At some point, Olivia's brother, a detective, was accused after someone planted a corruption charge over him. Frank managed to intervene in order to prevent his companion's expulsion from the force, but unfortunately, Olivia's brother was ultimately demoted to Supply and Facilities Management, a job he ended up hating. By2071, while Frank had left the force, Olivia had been transferred to theNCPD PrecinctinArroyo.
